item.title: What is RSS?
item.description:
RSS is a defined standard with the specific purpose of delivering updates to web-based content. Using this standard, webmasters provide headlines and fresh content in a succinct manner. Meanwhile, consumers use RSS readers and news aggregators to collect and monitor their favorite feeds in one centralized program or location. Content viewed in the RSS reader or news aggregator is place known as an RSS feed.
Test555

item.title: Feed Editor
item.description:
Powerful and easy-to-use RSS feed editor for all. With the help of this program you can not only create your own, professional looking RSS feeds, but also to maintain and update them according to a predefined schedule.

Download FeedEditor

Purchase FeedEditor for $19.95

Upload & Publish Feeds

Download FeedEditor

item.title: Feed Mix
item.description: Feed Mix is not just an RSS reader, it can also edit existing feed or create a new one, or even form a totally new feed from several existing one and then publish it to the web site.

item.title: Feed Mix: Main Features
item.description:
Multiple RSS version support
Convenient an editing tool and viewing RSS channel
Convenient, intuitively clear interface
The unlimited number of Channels and Projects
Feed Image Support
Image Editor
WYSIWYG HTML Editor
Upload & Publish Feeds
Export Support
Built in blog-client with support LiveJournal and Blogger API
Means of interaction with the post program
Support of proxy-servers
Integration with Microsoft Internet Explorer
Low system requirements
Small size of the program

item.title: RSS Wizard
item.description: RSS Wizard - is an HTML to RSS converter that will generate an RSS feed from pretty well any HTML web page - with no requirement to edit the source HTML first.

item.title: RSS Publisher
item.description: RSS Publisher is a program for RSS publishers. Using this program one can not only upload any number of new RSS feeds to web servers, but also save and manage existing RSS feeds. The program has a number of unique features, allowing to automate the process of uploading and archiving of RSS feeds. The RSS Publisher works under OS Windows 95, 98, ME, NT 4.0, 2000 and XP.

item.title: RSS Publisher: Main Features
item.description:
Multiple RSS version support
Convenient and intuitive interface
Unlimited number of tasks
Feed Image Support
"Smart Backup" function
FTP support
Logging all progress in a log file
Low system requirements
And more important... IT's FREE!

item.title: ExtraLabs Software: Support
item.description: Extralabs Software is looking for feedback from users. If you use RSS and need some tools for making your work more efficient then fill in the form an press 'Send'! We'll try to write the program you need!
